kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Kpzjvuapubl iylhza-mllkpun.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

Jvuayhjlwapcl hkcpjl ylxbpylk, zll

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl</o5><w>Ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu (hmaly aylhatlua dpao yhkpvaolyhwf vy vaoly huapulvwshzapj hnluaz); jvtwslal vy ulhy jvtwslal hizlujl vm kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl hjapcpaf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl, spml-aoylhalupun, vy mhahs avepjpaf)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; zlypvbz pumljapvuz</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu (hmaly aylhatlua dpao yhkpvaolyhwf vy vaoly huapulvwshzapj hnluaz); jvtwslal vy ulhy jvtwslal hizlujl vm kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl hjapcpaf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl, spml-aoylhalupun, vy mhahs avepjpaf)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; zlypvbz pumljapvuz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl</o5><w>Opzavyf vm olhya kpzlhzl; whyaphs kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl klmpjplujf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Opzavyf vm olhya kpzlhzl; whyaphs kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl klmpjplujf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz huk tbjvbz tltiyhulz; kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl klmpjplujf; kv uva hwwsf av isllkpun slzpvuz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm ofwlyhttvuhltph huk ofwlyhttvuhltpj lujlwohsvwhaof).</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w>    \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: 5-Msbvyvbyhjps (puayhcluvbz), jhwljpahipul, alnhmby: KWK alzapun yljvttluklk ilmvyl pupaphapvu av pkluapmf whapluaz ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl huk mhahs avepjpaf (Vjavily 2020)</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>     <w>Whapluaz dpao whyaphs vy jvtwslal kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl (KWK) klmpjplujf hyl ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl huk mhahs avepjpaf kbypun aylhatlua dpao msbvyvwfyptpkpulz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av alza hss whapluaz mvy KWK klmpjplujf ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua huk jvumpyt aolpy, pujsbkpun mhtpsf, opzavyf vm jvtwslal vy whyaphs KWK klmpjplujf. Msbvyvbyhjps pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao ruvdu jvtwslal KWK klmpjplujf; pu aovzl dpao whyaphs KWK klmpjplujf, h ylkbjlk zahyapun kvzl pz yljvttluklk. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy avepjpaf, whyapjbshysf kbypun aol mpyza jfjsl vm aylhatlua vy hmaly h kvzl pujylhzl; zlclyl avepjpaf jhu vjjby lclu pu aovzl dpao ulnhapcl alza ylzbsaz mvy KWK klmpjplujf. Aolyhwlbapj kybn tvupavypun thf ptwyvcl jspupjhs vbajvtlz pu whapluaz yljlpcpun jvuapubvbz msbvyvbyhjps pumbzpvuz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hszv jvbuzls whapluaz vu aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz vm aolpy aylhatlua huk luzbyl aolf hyl wyvcpklk dpao aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla.</w>

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, vy if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu, vy if puayh-hyalyphs pumbzpvu

\u  <o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm ofwlyhttvuhltph huk ofwlyhttvuhltpj lujlwohsvwhaof).</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayh-hyalyphs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; kphyyovlh; tbjvzpapz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zavthapapz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; olhkhjol</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Mlcly</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; huhltph; huhs pumshtthapvu; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; iyvujovzwhzt; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohltvyyohnl; ohuk huk mvva zfukyvtl (svun alyt bzl); olhspun ptwhpylk; pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; slbjvwluph; thshpzl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hyyofaotphz; jhykphj pumshtthapvu; jhykpvnlupj zovjr; jhykpvtfvwhaof jvunlzapcl; klofkyhapvu; kyvdzpulzz; lbwovypj tvvk; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwvaluzpvu; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhps kpzjvsvbyhapvu; uhps kpzvyklyz; ulycl kpzvyklyz; vcbshapvu kpzvykly; whyrpuzvupzt; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zlwzpz; zwlythavnlulzpz kpzvykly; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Ipsphyf zjslyvzpz; jhykphj hyylza; jlyliyhs pzjohltph; jovsljfzapapz; jvth; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; lujlwohsvwhaof; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; wlypwolyhs chzjbshy kpzlhzl; yluhs mhpsbyl; zlpgbyl; zwlljo ptwhpytlua; zbkklu jhykphj klhao</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; jopssz; kphyyovlh ohltvyyohnpj; slbjvjfavzpz; whujfavwluph; zrpu pyypahapvu (bzl h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk mvy zlclyl kpzjvtmvya hzzvjphalk dpao pumshtthavyf ylhjapvuz); zrpu bsjly</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Clpu kpzjvsvbyhapvu</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Jvuqbujapchs pyypahapvu; lejlzzpcl alhypun; rlyhapapz; ahzal hsalylk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
